task.title: Sending files using Bluetooth®
task.shortdesc: You can use Bluetooth® to send your picture, videos, and audio files to another Bluetooth® enabled device such as a phone or notebook computer.

context.p: Before you begin, make sure that the receiving device is set to discoverable mode

step.cmd: From the phoneÂ menu, open the application that contains the file you want to send.
Select the media file and press the Bluetooth® key.
If necessary turn on the Bluetooth® device.
If you have not paired with the receiving device before, select Scan for devices.
Select the name of the receiving device
Press Send to sent the file.
